reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My partner and I have just returned from a week's break at this hotel. Having read all the reviews (more than once!) before travelling we were a little apprehensive.
reviews.title: We enjoyed ourselves.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009
reviews.text: I have to say, however, that when judged against what we paid we were more than satisfied with what we found.
reviews.title: Good Value For The Most Part But Lacking Proper Entertainment

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: We were on the VIP package so had one of the superior rooms, actually one of the bungalow rooms which, whilst nothing special, was clean, quiet, comfortable and spacious. The patio area was the only disappointment but as we did not wish to spend much time there it didn't really bother us.
reviews.title: The most miserable staff ever......

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived very early in the morning and were not due to check-in officially until midday but were lucky to have Manos on duty. He could not have been more helpful. Although we were strictly not entitled to anything until later we received our wrist bands (all-inclusive guests have to wear these) and so could have an early breakfast. We were actually in our room before 8.30, catching up on lost sleep!
reviews.title: Could be so much better with some easy changes

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: We found virtually all the staff extremely helpful, co-operative and friendly. They work long hours but almost always with a smile
reviews.title: relaxing weeks holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: Was at Rinella in 2001 and it was very nice, obviously taken the eye off the ball, this trip October 2009, I would put the accomodation in the below average category, rooms are very tired and it's supposed to have been renovated recently, obviously missed a few then.......!
reviews.title: Average compared to last time

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Day time bar/snack staff are ok and you don't have to wait long to get served, night time totally different, the staff are programmed NOT to serve you quickly, there are two different bars at night and depending on where you are sitting will depend on what waiter serves you, people were actually changing tables in between drinks to get served quicker.
reviews.title: Bad review based only on our standard room - uprgraded to superior room which really was superior!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Food was good and varied, you have to remember 'when in Rome', don't expect British tasting food as some people do, complainig that the beans weren't HP, (give us a break!!!)
reviews.title: Do they not have people with dissabilities in Crete.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Value for money? Depends what you paid, shop around before you book, some people paid more for a week than others paid for a fortnight (I know, why ask?)
reviews.title: Could do better

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: Complaints about cats were rife, the simplest way not to allow them to bother you is don't sit in the outside restaurant at night, if you do don't sit beside a certain nationality (also have a reputation for hogging sunbeds) that feeds them by throwing food under the table. One family in particular kept feeding two cats and received scowls from all around them, we eventually complained to the waiters when THEY ended up with 5 cats under the table and THEY were trying to shoo them away.
reviews.title: A wonderful place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Our room (a superior) was very clean, maid came in every day and we had a well stocked mini fridge.. but hairdryer was rubbish (so either take oe or ask behind reception for a better one! We heard plenty of other guests complaining abut the standard of their rooms though so make sure you have a superior version! TV is pretty poor all you get in English is the news!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: One word - dire! For a so called 5 star hotel its appallingly bad and only improves after a lot of drinking!
reviews.title: Lots of Cats and Dogs running around and if you are booked for October check as we were told that its overbooked!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: do not go to this hotel if you have a physical disability.Threr are zero facilities.Just returned with my disabled father who struggled with steps EVERYWHERE..Even the odd ramp was too steep to get a mobility aid up.Toilets are either up or down two flights of stairs in public areas.I was assured before going that it was suitable for disabled guests.There are also lots of Health and safety issues.There was i thinking Greece are in the European union,Oh sorry they are but refuse to comply with any regulation we pay our taxes to conform to.
reviews.title: not for disabled

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall food good ,roms clean and weather unbelievably fantastic, 30c most days.
reviews.title: Not as good as the brochure states

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room was very poor the decor was plain we had four chairs in the room that looked like they had lost a table? the beds were worse than a put you up type of bed. The bathroom was terrible flaking paint on the walls and a bath that looked like the enamel had come of so bad that you would not want to bath in it. When you had managed to scrap the double doors open to get out onto your patio area we had three chairs with a small table beware on of the chairs was broken could have been nasty. The rooms allocated to us looked like they were awaiting refurbishment so many things bad about them the reception staff were not interested in our complaint just made a note in the diary and said come back in 3 days may be able to change us to another room? The bars and reception areas where fine and clean only thing to be aware of is the pack of dogs that run all round the hotel and the many cats that are about also in dinning rooms.
reviews.title: You can easily be confused

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For those who are well travelled and definitive about their arrangements its worth mentionjing that this hotel Rinella Beach at #1 and 100% positive is the same hotel as Hotel Rinella Beach at #5 and 68% positive.
reviews.title: Not as Greek Hospitality used to be
